寸.definition: a unit of length; inch; thumb

寸口.definition: location on wrist over the radial artery where pulse is taken in TCM

寸土寸金.definition: land is extremely expensive (in that area) (idiom)

寸步不離.definition: to follow sb closely (idiom); to keep close to

寸步難移.definition: see 寸步難行|寸步难行[cun4 bu4 nan2 xing2]

寸步難行.definition: unable to move a single step (idiom); to be in an (extremely) difficult situation

寸草不生.definition: lit. not even a blade of grass grows (idiom); fig. barren

寸金難買寸光陰.pinyin: cun4 jin1 nan2 mai3 cun4 guang1 yin1
寸金難買寸光陰.definition: An ounce of gold can't buy you an interval of time (idiom); Money can't buy you time.; Time is precious.

寸陰.definition: a very brief period of time (lit. the time it takes for a shadow to move an inch)

寸頭.definition: (male hair style) crew cut; butch cut
